events.message: I received my order last week but I want to return it and get a refund because the item doesn't meet my expectations.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to customer dissatisfaction with the received product.
Assigning the case to a customer service representative specialized in handling refund processes.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to assist you with your refund request for your recent order.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason you would like to return the item for a refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456. The product arrived damaged and wasn't what I expected, so I want to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately and provide you with return shipping instructions.
I appreciate your quick response and look forward to receiving the return instructions as soon as possible.
The refund has been processed successfully, and you should see the amount credited back to your payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case now. Please feel free to contact us again if you have more questions or require further assistance.
